member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzer
member.summary: Component that performs image analysis via Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API.
member.remarks: A Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API subscription key is required to use this component. For more information, see the full direct API for. Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzer.#ctor(Microsoft.Psi.Pipeline,Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzerConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The pipeline to add the component to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzer.In
member.summary: Gets the input stream of images.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzer.Out
member.summary: Gets the output stream of analysis results.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzer.AnalysisResultToString(Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.ComputerVision.Models.ImageAnalysis)
member.summary: Parse Analysis Result into a string.
member.returns: Returns a string corresponding to the analysis result.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzerConfiguration
member.summary: Represents the configuration for the component.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzerConfiguration.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Azure.CognitiveServices.Vision.ComputerVision.Models.VisualFeatureTypes[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The Azure subscription key to use.
The region for the Azure subscription.
The endpoint for the Azure subscription.
The list of features to look for.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzerConfiguration.SubscriptionKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the subscription key for Cognitive Services Vision API.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzerConfiguration.Region
member.remarks: The region associated with the subscription key.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzerConfiguration.Endpoint
member.remarks: The endpoint associated with the subscription key.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.ImageAnalyzerConfiguration.VisualFeatures
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of visual features to extract from images.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.Operators
member.summary: Stream operators and extension methods for Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.Operators.GetTags(Microsoft.Psi.IProducer{Microsoft.Psi.Shared{Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.Image}},System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Psi.DeliveryPolicy)
member.summary: Gets the tags associated with an images via Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API..
member.param: The Azure subscription key to use.
The region for the Azure subscription.
The endpoint for the Azure subscription.
member.returns: A stream of tags for each image.
member.remarks: A Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API subscription key is required to use this operator. For more information, see the full direct API for. Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.CognitiveServices.Vision.Operators.DetectObjects(Microsoft.Psi.IProducer{Microsoft.Psi.Shared{Microsoft.Psi.Imaging.Image}},System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.Psi.DeliveryPolicy)
member.summary: Performs object detection on a stream of images via the Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API..
member.param: The Azure subscription key to use.
The region for the Azure subscription.
The endpoint for the Azure subscription.
member.returns: A stream of detected objects for each image.
member.remarks: A Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API subscription key is required to use this operator. For more information, see the full direct API for. Microsoft Cognitive Services Vision API
